Atheros AR9580 Wireless Network Adapter (rev 01) [168c:0033]
    Subsystem: Device [19b6:d016]]
 ==Links of Interest== [https://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/R11-160330120340.pdf This datasheet] indicates all of these era R11e cards use AR9582. *[https://eko.one.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?id=16402 ''iwinfo'' on '''eko.one.pl''' forums] (OUI: 4C:5E:0C) :[[MikroTik R11e-2HnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d010) :[[MikroTik R11e-2HPnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d016) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d057) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HacT]] (168c:003c/19b6:d03c) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HacD]] (168c:003c/19b6:d042) [[Category:English Documentation]]
